message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SY, cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SE 

The paper deals with the topic of cyber attacks on microgrids and proposes a software-defined control architecture to mitigate these attacks. This falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) as well as systems and control (cs.SY). The use of wireless and power-line communication technologies also suggests the sub-categories of networking and internet architecture (cs.NI) and distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC). Finally, the paper also discusses the implementation of the proposed architecture using software engineering principles, indicating the sub-category of software engineering (cs.SE).
